text: Not really sure where else this question can go... Could someone help me use a secret in github for a HubSpot api key? My repo is private, but i'm still keen to hold the api key as a secret for obvious reasons. I've seen some guidance about having a yml file but my repo doesnt have one (as it's for a custom card and i used the getting started template). I don't suppose someone could help me with it?

You don't want to push your secrets to GitHub.  If you are referring to the access token, HubSpot already knows how to reference this secret because the card is registered with the custom app.  If you have third party secrets you would use ...`hs secret add {secret name}`
